title: Evil Dead The Definitive Saga
description:
IF YOU'VE NEVER SEEN EVIL DEAD AND WANT TO WATCH ASH VS. EVIL DEAD, WATCH THIS FIRST!!!!

******REUPLOADED SMALLER FILE******
This file was 11gigs before but now only a little over 6.

This is the entire Evil Dead trilogy mashed up into one. It is a fan edit of the entire trilogy as one cohesive film as you've never seen it before!

This edit rectifies things such as the bridge being closed in one and two, the girlfriend rising from the grave when in part one she has her head cut off, the cast from the first film hearing the tape and scenes of the second film, etc...

This edit was done with all the deleted scenes added in all three films, was done in November of 2015 and has never been seen before!

It maintains the original ending from Army of Darkness with S-Mart but incorporates the sleep time, in order to stay true to the creation of Ash vs Evil Dead and takes it into consideration in this edit. 

Additional Never Before Seen Footage
All rolled into one!

Running Time: 4 hours 20 mins

Enjoy!
